channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Migrants stranded in Mexico try to restart life after Trump eliminates legal pathway to US
item.description: Many migrants have been left stranded in Mexican border cities after the Trump administration immediately canceled tens of thosands of appointments made through a government app called CBP One that offered a legal pathway to the U.S.

item.title: Top Justice Department official orders prosecutors to drop charges against New York Mayor Eric Adams
Villagers offer support for a critical lifeline in rural Alaska days after plane crash kills 10
